'''House Uller''' is a vassal house sworn to [[House Martell]] of [[Sunspear]]. Their seat is [[Hellholt]].
sections.Known members: * [[Ellaria Sand]], the [[bastard]] daughter of Lord Uller and paramour of Prince [[Oberyn Martell]].
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Uller is one of House Martell's most powerful vassals, and reputed to be impulsive and unpredictable. There's a saying in Dorne that goes "Half of the Ullers are half-mad, and the other half are worse." Their arms are a rayonne yellow over crimson while their words are unknown.

===Members===
*Lord Harmen Uller, Lord of Hellholt
** Ellaria Sand, his bastard daughter
* Ser Ulwyck Uller, his brother
